name: East Van Brewing Company
address: East Van Brewing Company, 1675 Venables St, Vancouver, BC V5L 2H1

featured_reviews.review_id: I came here for to cool off a bit on this hot day. My girlfriend got the lobster grilled cheese and it tasted amazing!! I got the lobster mac and cheese that tasted great,  but was dissapointed at the small portion size for the price. We got the flights and got to try the wide variety of beers on the menu. I would love to come again, but would try something else on the menu that is a bit bigger.
featured_reviews.review_text: I came here for to cool off a bit on this hot day. My girlfriend got the lobster grilled cheese and it tasted amazing!! I got the lobster mac and cheese that tasted great,  but was dissapointed at the small portion size for the price. We got the flights and got to try the wide variety of beers on the menu. I would love to come again, but would try something else on the menu that is a bit bigger.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Mike, thanks for review.  We'll pass along your comments to the Saltys lobster guys.   We are more interested in what you thought about our beer!  Look forward to seeing you again!

featured_reviews.review_id:
First time Customer alert  
Came in for a girls' night. Happy Hour ~

I had the mac and cheese that was amazing. -Perfect balance between rich cheese flavors and a satisfyingly gooey texture.  Pairing this delightful dish with a flight of craft beers is a match made in heaven.
-The server knew we had a long day and just wanted to talk, so they made sure we had our space to talk without interrupting.
The inside was a lot bigger than I thought and had an outside patio as well.

-Would come back and recommend though I do wish their happy hour served more options or a bit of later happy hour window.
featured_reviews.review_text:
First time Customer alert  
Came in for a girls' night. Happy Hour ~

I had the mac and cheese that was amazing. -Perfect balance between rich cheese flavors and a satisfyingly gooey texture.  Pairing this delightful dish with a flight of craft beers is a match made in heaven.
-The server knew we had a long day and just wanted to talk, so they made sure we had our space to talk without interrupting.
The inside was a lot bigger than I thought and had an outside patio as well.

-Would come back and recommend though I do wish their happy hour served more options or a bit of later happy hour window.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Julian, thanks for all the STARZ and kind words.  we do hope to see you again soon!  cheers until the next time!

featured_reviews.review_id: Great place yo have beers in East Van. Life hack: They don't serve food so they let you bring your Down Low Chicken meal to eat here and will even offer you a discount on your first tap beer. Amazing. Good service, environment and quality.
featured_reviews.review_text: Great place yo have beers in East Van. Life hack: They don't serve food so they let you bring your Down Low Chicken meal to eat here and will even offer you a discount on your first tap beer. Amazing. Good service, environment and quality.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Roberto, thanks for all the STARZ!!  One note though, we do serve our own food and we also have Saltys Lobster Shack that operates right out of our brewery.  DL is always welcome too!

featured_reviews.review_id: Great beer! Fantastic quick service, and the best lobster man n cheese I have ever had! I will definitely return!
featured_reviews.review_text: Great beer! Fantastic quick service, and the best lobster man n cheese I have ever had! I will definitely return!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Brandon, thanks for the STARZ and kind words. Everyone here thanks you for the review and we can't wait to see you again!

featured_reviews.review_id: Great little brewpub just off The Drive. Really enjoyed the Jasmine Rice Lager.
featured_reviews.review_text: Great little brewpub just off The Drive. Really enjoyed the Jasmine Rice Lager.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Steve, thanks for all STARZ...super happy you enjoyed the beer.  Hope to see you again soon.   Cheers!

featured_reviews.review_id: Cute little brewery and brewpub in a nice neighbourhood, service was prompt and good, had a good view of their brewing tanks right next room. Beer was ok, nothing spectacular, but main point was to cool down a bit during a hot day so it served it purpose well.
featured_reviews.review_text: Cute little brewery and brewpub in a nice neighbourhood, service was prompt and good, had a good view of their brewing tanks right next room. Beer was ok, nothing spectacular, but main point was to cool down a bit during a hot day so it served it purpose well.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jussi, thanks so much for the great review and all the STARZ!!  Hope to see you again soon.

featured_reviews.review_id: Outstanding service!! All of the staff were super friendly. I was here with some friends and dont really drink much beer, the boys behind the bar were more than helpful helping me choose one! I ended up having the Blackberry sour and it was delicious! I must say, the music selection was excellent, you could tell whoever was in charge of the music could really read the room.
featured_reviews.review_text: Outstanding service!! All of the staff were super friendly. I was here with some friends and dont really drink much beer, the boys behind the bar were more than helpful helping me choose one! I ended up having the Blackberry sour and it was delicious! I must say, the music selection was excellent, you could tell whoever was in charge of the music could really read the room.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey there Zaya, appreciate all the STARZ and so happy to hear you enjoyed the sour...come back soon for the barrel aged cherry which should be ready soon!

featured_reviews.review_id: Sat down Friday night at east van brewing with a group of five friends, we were very nicely welcomed by our tables waiter in a timely fashion. Our waiters name was Drake he was really happy and positive bringing great Friday vibes along with fast and attentive service. drinks were good and cold! food was good and hot! all around awesome experience. Would come back for the good Time vibes from the waiter! Thanks Drake!
featured_reviews.review_text: Sat down Friday night at east van brewing with a group of five friends, we were very nicely welcomed by our tables waiter in a timely fashion. Our waiters name was Drake he was really happy and positive bringing great Friday vibes along with fast and attentive service. drinks were good and cold! food was good and hot! all around awesome experience. Would come back for the good Time vibes from the waiter! Thanks Drake!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey kellan, thanks so much for the STARZ and kind words.  We'll pass along a praise and give Drake a high five!  Look forward to your next check visit.
